On Mon, 21 Apr 2003, Daniel Paul Hightower wrote:

> Since we have 3 people interested, I'd like to suggest we work out how
>  to decide the theme.  Should it just the people creating the
> scenarios or the general list who decide the theme of the month?
>
> It's not that I want to shirk from the responsibility, but since I
> plan on participating, it might not be considered fair for me to pick
> the theme since potentially it could give me extra time to work on the
> scenario.

I would be interested in participating as well. I had some really nice
scenarios going back in middle school (didn't know of this list, though),
and it'll give me a small break from coding (although school doesn't leave
enough time for that as it is).

I think the theme should be cool multiplayer levels. I really enjoy making
those.

- Yan
